name: Bruce Weaver
text: Great people and service. They took control of my project and exceeded my expectations. The priice was right what I had calculated it would be as well. Great Job!!!

name: adam ledbetter
text: Great service. I highly recommend them for all your welding needs. Stainless steel, aluminum, mild steel and everything in between. Great repairs and fab work from scratch.they can even cut custom jobs on the water plasma table.

name: ken hollis
text:
I had a very good experience at Valley Repair Service on 7-2-2019. We had a lawn tractor wheel and hinge break off a cutting deck. I called this service and spoke with Ken the shop foreman and he told me they could make the repair. I drove to the shop with trailer and mower in tow. Ken welded the wheel hinge back onto the cutting deck within minutes! Great service and very nice welding work!
Thank you to Ken and Valley Repair Service!
